title: Cubism
creator_credit: George Barford and International Film Bureau
brief_description: Traces the development of cubism as a style of painting through the works of the artists who experimented with it. Shows how interest in Cezanne’s painting led Picasso and Braque to experiment with pictorial arrangement and to develop both analytical and synthetic cubism.
description: Traces the development of cubism as a style of painting through the works of the artists who experimented with it. Shows how interest in Cezanne’s painting led Picasso and Braque to experiment with pictorial arrangement and to develop both analytical and synthetic cubism.
